price: 38. Y creamos los cielos y la tierra, y cuanto existe entre ellos, en seis días[964] sin sentir fatiga alguna.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ
footnotes: [964]  Ver la nota de pie de la aleya 54 de la sura 7.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin wamā massanā min lughūbin
